nodes.name: Content Request Webhook
nodes.notes: Receives content generation requests with topic and parameters

nodes.name: Process Input
nodes.notes: Validates and prepares content generation parameters

nodes.name: Generate Content
nodes.notes: Uses AI to generate platform-specific content

nodes.name: Format Response
nodes.notes: Structures the AI response and adds metadata

nodes.name: Send Response
nodes.notes: Returns the generated content to the requester

nodes.name: Daily Content Schedule
nodes.notes: Triggers daily content generation for consistent posting

nodes.name: Prepare Daily Topic
nodes.notes: Creates daily content topics based on day of week
